They fell on to a tomb, smashing its case and severing the heads of two mummies.Chief curator Zahi Hawass told how they then ransacked the souvenir shop. He said: These idiots missed the real treasure and stole from the gift shop instead. The Coptic Museum, Royal Jewellery Museum, National Museum of Alexandria and El Manial Museum have also been targeted. Mr Zahi Hawass said: "My heart is broken and my blood is boiling."

who was employed by publicist Max Clifford , is suing the tabloid claiming her voice mail was illegally accessed in 2006 to mine information on actor Ralph Fiennes and singer Cornelia Crisan. target="_blank"> The Independent reports: "The alleged hacking, which it is claimed allowed the NotW to print a similar story to that only obtained by the Sunday Mirror and The Mail on Sunday after paying Ms Crisan some? 35,000, is the latest evidence that the practice was used to monitor the activities of journalists and publicists, as well as public figures and celebrities. " NOTW associate editor Ian Edmondson has been named a co-defendant in the case. He was sacked last month after it was revealed he was linked to a private investigator. The redesigned 2011 Chrysler Town& Country and Dodge Grand Caravan have been driving off the assembly line for several weeks, and the vehicles are selling well, Sergio Marchionne has said. I think whenever we launch new products coming out of these plants, we need to be there, said Sergio Marchionne last Wednesday during the North American International Auto Show in Detroit. "I think it's an important recognition of the effort that's gone in here by our colleagues on the shop floor."
